extensionName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store and in Chrome

extensionDescription.message: Affiche les rotations actuelles et à venir des stages Splatoon.
extensionDescription.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store and in Chrome

error.message: Prochaine rotations indisponibles pour le moment.
error.description: Displayed when the data can't be retrieved

noRegion.message: Merci de sélectionner une région dans les paramètres de l'extension.
noRegion.description: Displayed when the user has no region set

unknown.description: Displayed as a stage name when a stage is not recognized by the extension

nextRotation.description: Displayed before each rotation to indicate when is the next one

currentRotation.description: Displayed as the title of the current rotation

timeFormatLabel.description: Title in the options page for chosing the time format

12hoursLabel.description: Label in the options page for selecting the 12 hour format

24hoursLabel.description: Label in the options page for selecting the 24 hour format

regionLabel.description: Title in the options page for chosing the region of the user

regionJP.description: Choice for Japan in the region dropdown option

regionNA.description: Choice for North America in the region dropdown option

regionEU.description: Choice for Europe/Oceania in the region dropdown option

mapsThumbnailsLabel.description: Title in the options page for chosing if thumbnails are shown with or without ink

mapsInked.description: Choice for loading the maps thumbnails with ink in them

mapsNotInked.description: Choice for loading the maps thumbnails without ink in them

mapsNight.description: Choice for loading the maps thumbnails seen at night

offsetLabel.description: Title in the options page for setting offset hours

offsetWarning.message: Attention: Changez la valeur uniquement si l'heure des rotations est erronée.
offsetWarning.description: Warning displayed on the offset option

savedMessage.description: Text displayed when an option is successfully changed or set
